title: Brian Muraresku: "The Immortality Key"
description: A quest for the holy grail - from the Ancient Greeks through today - a fascinating read on religion. Hear Michael's conversation with Brian Muraresku, author of "The Immortality Key: The Secret History of the Religion with No Name." Original air date 9 October 2020. The book was published on 29 September 2020.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Brian Muraresku, Michael Smerconish)
